mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIGGING( WRITER, SUBJECT, CONTENT, DIGGING_TOPIC, FILE, ENROLL_DT ) VALUES ( #{writer}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{diggingTopic}, #{file}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT WRITER FROM DIGGING)
mapper.update: UPDATE DIGGING SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE DIGGING_ID = #{diggingId}
UPDATE DIGGING SET THUMBS_UP = THUMBS_UP + 1 WHERE DIGGING_ID = #{diggingId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE DIGGING_ID = #{diggingId}
